about_the_game:
PLAYABLE DEMO : Discover the universe of "Nargül - Humans are among us", just before the beginning of the adventure.

  • Play as "Patbül", one of the alien characters.
  • Discover Flübeach, one of the temperate beaches of Trappist-1e.
  • Chat with the locals.
  • Contribute to the beginning of the story.

In the full version, play as Nargül, a jovial, curious and amnesiac alien.
“Nargül – Humans are among us” is a virtual reality action adventure game. Immerse yourself in the heart of an exo-adventure: investigate to regain your memory and find out the reason for the presence of the earthlings. Blast your way through this exotic island full of challenges. Fight against creatures, collect top secret information, and uncover the ultimate truth.

Note : This demo has been only tested with Oculus Rift S and Quest. For support, contact us via our Discord server.

name: Nargül - Humans are among us Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 580 - 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: VR headset needed
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-8700 / AMD Ryzen 7 5800
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2070 / AMD Rx 6600-XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: VR headset needed

short_description: Play as "Patbül", one of the alien characters. Explore and interact freely with the characters. Solve objectives and contribute to the beginning of the story.
